name: clicky-game
label: Clicky Game
description: This is a memory game created in React.

name: kyndCo
label: KyndCo
description: This app turns the idea of 'doing good' into a game and encourages users to compelte acts of kindness, unlocking badges and increasingly more complex acts of kindess the more 'good' they do.

name: constructor-game
label: Hangman
description: A word guess command-line game using constructor functions.

name: friend-finder
label: Friend Finder
description: A compatibility-based 'FriendFinder' application. This full-stack site takes in results from users' surveys, then compares their answers with those from other users. Upon submission of the survey, the app displays the name and picture of the user with the best overall match.

name: bamazon
label: Bamazon: Customer
description: An Amazon-like storefront with MySQL. The app will take in orders from customers and display an updated stock from the store's inventory.
